Art. 4.229. 
Distribution and partition 
Father, mother and other ascendants may distribute and partition their property among their children and descendants.
Such divisions may be made by gift or by will, subject to the formalities, conditions and rules prescribed for gifts and wills.
Partition by donation may only concern present assets. Insofar as such partition contains an agreement as to succession, articles 4.244 to 4.253 apply.
